goal: Implement query executor that executes parsed queries against the knowledge graph
description: Add query execution capabilities to the query module. The QueryExecutor class takes a KnowledgeGraph and executes QueryIntent objects, routing to appropriate query functions based on QueryType and returning structured QueryResult objects. Supports FIND_DEFINITION, FIND_DEPENDENTS, FIND_DEPENDENCIES, FIND_IMPACT, FIND_CYCLES, and LIST_ARTIFACTS query types.

contains.name: QueryResult
contains.description: Dataclass representing the result of executing a query against the knowledge graph.

contains.name: query_type
contains.description: The type of query that was executed (QueryType).

contains.name: data
contains.description: The result data - nodes, files, impact dict, etc. (Any).

contains.name: QueryExecutor
contains.description: Executor class that runs parsed QueryIntent objects against a KnowledgeGraph and returns QueryResult objects.

contains.name: __init__
contains.description: Initialize the QueryExecutor with a KnowledgeGraph instance.

contains.name: execute
contains.description: Execute a parsed query intent and return the result. Routes to appropriate query function based on QueryType.
